name: Impossible figther game (Final)
description:
This game was made on 4 days by one person this is an physics flying shot em game inspired by flash 2d flight simulators and arcade type of games Made on the awesome Click team fission for a game jam however the game has recived 2 updates fixing and adding stuff to improve game play

this games is an idea came with my brother while looking at birds

and keep playing games!

This game is dead technically because my old computer died, losing all progress for all game tats why there is not updates

I apologize for this
